original_text: Show that you respect the Lord in the way that you use your money. Offer the first part of the harvest from your farm to him.
korean_text: 네 재물과 네 소산물의 처음 익은 열매로 여호와를 공경하라

sentences.original_text: Show that you respect the Lord
in the way that you use your money
Offer the first part of the harvest
